name: Iron Dagger
desc: A small blade capable of sudden assaults and being thrown.
parry:
Gain the following benefits if the triggering _Attack_ is _Light_:
* Reduce the _Attack Roll_ by 1 or gain 1 _Guard_ against it.

name: Iron Shortsword
desc: A light blade that offers a balance between power and speed.
parry:
Gain the following benefits if the trigging _Attack_ was _Light_/_Versatile_:
* Reduce the _Attack Roll_ by 1 or gain 1 _Guard_ against it.

name: Iron Longsword
desc: A sword that can easily be used in one or both hands and is favored by many.
parry:
Gain the following benefits:
* Reduce the _Attack Roll_ by 1 or gain 1 _Guard_ against it. Iif this weapon is _Wielded_ in both hands, gain both effects.

name: Iron Greatsword
desc: A massive blade meant to be wielded in both hands, this weapon can cleave through most defenses.
parry:
Gain the following benefits:
* Reduce the _Attack Roll_ by 1 and gain 1 _Guard_ against it.
charged_effect: Deal +1 _Damage_ on a _Graze_+. Make this _Attack_ in a _Self_-Range _Cone_ 2/_Arc_ 1.

name: Colossal Blade
desc: A massive blade meant to be wielded in both hands, this weapon can cleave through most defenses.
parry: Gain 2 _Grit_.

name: Iron Handaxe
desc: A lightweight axe that weighs enough to punish a foe's defenses while allowing for swift strikes.
parry:
Gain the following benefits if the trigging _Attack_ was _Light_/_Versatile_:
* Gain 1 _Guard_ against the Attack.

name: Iron Battleaxe
desc: A powerful melee tool that cleaves through a foe's attempts to grit.
parry: Gain 1 _Guard_ against the triggering _Attack_.
charged_effect: Deal +1 Damage on a _Graze_+ and add [_Overpowering_ 1, _Pierce_ 1]. Additionally, this Weapon becomes _Reach_ 2.

name: Iron Greataxe
desc: A mighty axe wielded in two hands that crushes through all defenses and drives foes into the dirt.
charged_effect: Deal +1 Damage on a _Graze_+ and add [_Overpowering_ 1, _Pierce_ 1]. Make this _Attack_ in a _Self_-Range _Cone_ 2/_Arc_ 1.
parry: Gain 2 _Guard_ against the triggering _Attack_.

name: Iron Mace
desc: A simple weapon with a heavy, weighted head.
charged_effect: Deal +1 Damage on a _Graze_+ and add [_Overpowering_ 1].
parry: Gain 1 _Guard_ against the triggering _Attack_.

name: Iron Warhammer
desc: A heavy weapon that disregards all but the heaviest of armors.
charged_effect: Deal +1 Damage on a _Graze_+ and add [_Overpowering_ 1, _Pierce_ 1]. Additionally, this Weapon becomes _Reach_ 2.
parry: Gain 1 _Guard_ against the triggering _Attack_.

name: Iron Maul
desc: A weapon of sheer mass that pushes through armor and defenses alike to punish foes.
charged_effect: Deal +1 Damage on a _Graze_+ and add [_Overpowering_ 1, _Pierce_ 1]. Make this _Attack_ in a _Self_-Range _Cone_ 2/_Arc_ 1.
parry: Gain 2 _Guard_ against the triggering _Attack_.

name: Colossal Hammer
desc: A hammer with a head nearly the size of a man, barely able to be lifted by most.

name: Colossal Axe
desc: A massive, oversized axe that could fell a tree in a single swing.

name: Small Improvised
desc: A small weapon that could easily be fit in a hand, such as a stone or bottle.

name: Medium Improvised
desc: An object that is light enough to be wielded in one hand, such as a chair or tree branch.

name: Large Improvised
desc: A weapon large enough to require two hands, such as a table or heavy stone.

name: Iron Javelin
desc: A light spear that lacks the range of other lance weapons but can easily be flung to harry foes.
parry:
Gain the following benefits if the triggering _Attack_ is _Light_/_Versatile_:
* Opponent chooses: Either they gain _Vulnerable_ 1 or you reduce the _Attack Roll_ by 1.

name: Iron Spear
desc: Perhaps the most common weapon in the world, a spear allows consistent strikes at range while controlling a foe's movement.
parry:
Gain the following benefits:
* Opponent chooses: Either they gain _Vulnerable_ 1 or you reduce the _Attack Roll_ by 1.
* If this _Weapon_ is _Wielded_ in both hands, gain 1 _Guard_ against the Attack.

name: Iron Pike
desc: A powerful weapon with unparalleled reach and the weight to deal heavy damage to foes.
charged_effect: Instead, make this _Attack_ in a _Self_-Range _Line_ 3 and add [_Pierce_ 1].
parry:
Gain the following benefits:
* Opponent chooses: Either they gain _Vulnerable_ 1 or you reduce the _Attack Roll_ by 1.
* Gain 1 _Guard_ against the Attack.

name: Colossal Spear
desc: A near-comically long spear that can strike at great distances.

name: Recurve Bow
desc: A lighter bow that can be short from a variety of positions, allowing faster shots and close-quarters capabilities.
parry:
Gain the following benefits if the triggering _Attack_ is _Light_/_Versatile_:
* Reduce the _Value_ of _Vulnerable_ inflicted by 1, starting with the smallest Token.

name: Sling
desc: A simple weapon with a windup that pierces through many defenses.
charged_effect: Add [_Pierce_ 1] and deal +1 Damage on a _Hit_+.
parry: None.

name: Shortbow
desc: A bow that is equally in place hunting game and on the battlefield.
charged_effect: Add [_Arcing_] and deal +2 Damage on a _Hit_+.
parry:
Gain the following benefits:
* Reduce the _Value_ of _Vulnerable_ inflicted by 1, starting with the smallest Token.

name: Longbow
desc: A heavy bow that has unparalleled range and power, allowing deadly strikes from extreme range.
charged_effect: Add [_Arcing_, _Pierce_ 1] and deal +3 Damage on a _Hit_+.
parry:
Gain the following benefits:
* Reduce the _Value_ of _Vulnerable_ inflicted by 1, starting with the smallest Token.

name: Colossal Bow
desc: A heavy bow that has unparalleled range and power, allowing deadly strikes from extreme range.

name: Iron Buckler
desc: A small shield specialized for melee combat.
parry:
Gain the following benefits if the triggering _Attack_ is _Light_/_Versatile_:
* Reduce the _Attack Roll_ by 1 and gain 1 _Guard_ against it.
* If the _Attack_ is _Ranged_, treat yourself as at least _Lightly Obstructed_.
* Reduce the Value of _Vulnerable_ inflicted by 1, starting with the smallest Token.

name: Round Shield
parry:
Gain the following benefits:
* Reduce the _Attack Roll_ by 1 and gain 1 _Guard_ against it.
* If the _Attack_ is _Ranged_, treat yourself as at least _Heavily Obstructed_.
* Reduce the Value of _Vulnerable_ inflicted by 2, starting with the smallest Token.

name: Heater Shield
parry:
Gain the following benefits:
* Reduce the _Attack Roll_ by 2 and gain 1 _Guard_ against it.
* If the _Attack_ is _Ranged_, treat yourself as at least _Heavily Obstructed_.
* Reduce the Value of _Vulnerable_ inflicted by 2, starting with the smallest Token.

name: Pavise Shield
special: You may, as a 1 AP _Action_, stop _Wielding_ this _Weapon_ and plant it in the ground. Create the _Planted Shield_ _Obstacle_ in that space and immediately use its _Interact_. You may _Retrieve_ this _Weapon_ as normal, removing the _Obstacle_ in the process.
parry:
Gain the following benefits:
* Reduce the _Attack Roll_ by 2 and gain 2 _Guard_ against it.
* If the _Attack_ is _Ranged_, treat yourself as _Covered_.
* Reduce the Value of _Vulnerable_ inflicted by 3, starting with the smallest Token.

name: Dart
desc: A simple weapon that allows for quick attacks and clumsy melee strikes.
parry: None
special: Melee Attacks with this Weapon gain _Glancing_.

name: Small Fangs
desc: A fanged bite for creatures such as wolves and predatory cats.
special: This Weapon has _Advantage_ on Attacks against creatures you have _Grappled_ and gain _Pierce_ 1. However, while you are _Grappling_ a creature, this Weapon may only be used against that creature.

name: Calf Slicer
desc: A swift kick that knocks the legs out from under a foe, impairing their movement.
special: You do not have _Disadvantage_ on _Attacks_ with this Weapon while _Prone_.

name: Bell Ringer
desc: A risky strike that smashes a head into another, leaving one of the participants dazed and unable to respond.
special: If the foe _Negates_ you are inflicted with the Status instead, with the cost to _Negate_ decreased by 1. In addition, you do not have _Disadvantage_ on _Attacks_ with this Weapon while _Restrained_.

name: Crushing Elbow
desc: A brutal attack with an elbow, rattling a foe while breaking grapples.
special: Attacks with this Weapon have _Advantage_ against any creature you are in a _Grapple_ with if you are the _Bottom_. While the _Bottom_, on a _Hit_+, you may treat your expended _Grit_/_Momentum_ as 1 higher for the _Grapple Contest_ this _Turn_.

name: Knifehand Strike
desc: A strike with the edge of a hand, inflicting more serious damage while limiting a foe's offense.
special: If you inflict _Impaired_, you may instead choose to add that value to an existing _Impaired_ Token the creature has.

name: Forceful Palm
desc: A strike with an open hand that knocks foes off-balance.
special: If you inflict _Vulnerable_, you may instead choose to add that value to an existing _Vulnerable_ Token the creature has.

name: Snakebite Fist
desc: A jab that moves with the speed of a striking snake.
special: If you inflict _Dazed_, you may instead choose to add that value to an existing _Dazed_ Token the creature has.

name: Medium Fangs
desc: A fanged bite for creatures such as wolves and predatory cats.
special: This Weapon has _Advantage_ on Attacks against creatures you have _Grappled_ and gains _Pierce_ 1.

name: Falling Axe Kick
desc: A powerful, but risky kick relying on the heel that is particularly effective against creatures on the ground.
special: Attacks with this Weapon have a +1 Bonus against _Prone_ foes. If you _Miss_/_Graze_ with this Attack, gain _Exposed_ 1.

name: Rising Knee
desc: A strike with the knee that deals devastating damage to any creature you have grappled and can easily break a creature's guard.
special: Attacks with this Weapon have _Advantage_ against any creature you are in a _Grapple_ with if you are the _Top_. In addition, on a _Hit_+, add _Dazed_ 2.

name: Stone-Shattering Fist
desc: A massive swing that deals massive damage and knocks a foe off-balance.
special: If you _Miss_ with this Weapon, gain _Exposed_ 1.

name: Thunderclap Kick
desc: A quick kick that surprises a foe, limiting their offense and movement.
special: You may reduce the Value of an _Impaired_ Token inflicted by this _Attack_ by 2. If you do, add _Hobbled_ 1.

name: Thousand-Pound Crash
desc: A powerful slam with the body, knocking foes about like ragdolls.
special: If you _Push_ with this Weapon you may _Move_ an equal amount without expending Movement without provoking _Punishes_ from your Target. Increase your _Guard_ by 1 during this _Movement_.

name: Tornado Kick
desc: A kick making full use of the body that throws foes backwards and deals heavy damage.
special: If you _Push_ a creature into an _Obstacle_ increase the cost to _Negate_ by 1 and inflict an additional _Vulnerable_ of the same value (Always). If you _Miss_ with this Weapon, gain _Exposed_ 1.

name: Large Fangs
desc: A fanged bite for creatures such as wolves and predatory cats.
special: This Weapon has _Advantage_ on Attacks against creatures you have _Grappled_ and gain _Pierce_ 1.

name: Small Mandibles
desc: The crushing jaws of a large insect.
parry:
Gain the following benefits if the trigging Attack was Light/Versatile:
* Gain 1 _Fleeting_ _Grit_.

name: Small Needles
desc: Dangerous needles fired from the abdomen of an insectoid.
parry: None

name: Medium Needles
desc: Dangerous needles fired from the abdomen of an insectoid.
parry: None

name: Small Forearm
desc: The barbed leg of a soldier ant.
parry:
Gain the following benefits:
* Gain 1 _Fleeting_ _Grit_.
* You may spend _Grit_ to purchase a _Reflex_ effect, treating it as a _Grit_ effect for all other keywords. You may purchase up to 1 _Reflex_ worth of effects in this way.

name: Medium Forearm
desc: The barbed leg of a soldier ant.
parry:
Gain the following benefits:
* Gain 2 _Fleeting_ _Grit_.
* You may spend _Grit_ to purchase a _Reflex_ effect, treating it as a _Grit_ effect for all other keywords. You may purchase up to 1 _Reflex_ worth of effects in this way.
* You may spend up to 2 _Defense_ to reduce the _Value_ of _Vulnerable_ inflicted by 1 per _Defense_, starting with the smallest Token.
